message: He opens the umbrella, spins around, and walks away.
I watch him go, shaking my head.
It feels like I had an encounter with a mischievous spirit or something.
When I get back inside, I find Junker all shaken up.
Those brats made a complete mess of the shop...
First the kids, then some weird guy in a gas mask... Today's just one of those days.
Fighting off a wave of exhaustion, I start cleaning up.
